title: aDaiyalAm aruLai
sahitya:
Adaravu aLikkAdu pEdai enai Edukku vEdanaip-paTTiDak-kai viTTanaiyO vElavA


anupallavi

  bhUtalamIden vAzhvai pAzhum Uzvinai mOdi sOdanaikk-uLLAkkum pOdellAm aNaittu


caraNam    AdimUlamE enru alarina Olam anru kAdil mOdina pOdu kanindE aruL surandu 
pAdukAkka virainda bhakta paripAlanAgum mAdhavap-perumAnin marugan Aghum nI
